title: Best of The Herd: 7/29/20
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 7/29/20
description:
Colin likes Aaron Rodgers no longer being passive aggressive about his future with the Packers, the Astros cheated and now must face the consequences, the Patriots never do anything at random, and Aaron Donald is one of the best players in the NFL.

Guest: Former NFL Head Coach Eric Mangini

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
